amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Board of adjustment; appointment; restriction on powers.
amendatorysection.para: Except as provided in section 19-912.01, the local legislative body shall provide for the appointment of a board of adjustment. Any actions taken by the board of adjustment shall not exceed the powers granted by section 19-910.
